sources.title: The Garden of Allah (1936)
sources.description: The star-crossed desert romance of a cloistered woman and a renegade monk. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-garden-of-allah-1936/

metadata.Plot: Domini, an heiress who has led a cloistered life, visits the North African desert for spiritual renewal. There she meets Boris, recently escaped from a Trappist monastery. Their friendship ripens into love, but he conceals his past from her. Then in a remote oasis, they meet a man who knows his secret.
metadata.Writer: Robert Hichens, W.P. Lipscomb, Lynn Riggs
metadata.Actors: Marlene Dietrich, Charles Boyer, Tilly Losch
metadata.Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. 1 win & 2 nominations total
